transcript:
Customer: Aapne jis vyakti ko call kiya hai, woh abhi dusre call par vyast hai. Kripya pratiksha karein ya kuch samay pashchat prayas karein.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji, good afternoon sir, kya haal chaal hai? Alok baat kar raha hu.
Customer: Bas badhiya ji, badhiya.
Executive: Achcha ji sir bataiye, sab log theek hai?
Customer: Haan bas badhiya hai, aapka aashirwad hai.
Executive: Bas bas sir, sab theek thak hi rehna chahiye sir.
Customer: Achcha bataiye sir.
Executive: Main keh raha tha madam...
Customer: Asal mein kya hai madam ki kai saari meetings wagera lagi thi piche unka thoda sa kuch concern ho gaya tha toh usse woh aayi hai unke office.
Executive: Toh?
Customer: Toh unhone even bola hua tha aur even meeting wagera aapke case ke liye sara kuch discussion bhi ho gaya tha kal subah morning mein.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Maine unko sara cheeze reports wagera jo aapne bataya tha mujhe woh saari cheeze maine unke saath discuss bhi ki thi ki bhai ye leads wagera kya hai, itna hai, abhi itna hum log expect kar rahe hai woh saari cheeze maine unke saath one on one discussion kiya.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Toh unka bhi yahi kehna tha ki keh rahe hai sir ko ye toh bolo ki bhai at least jab package liya hai, koi cheez upgrade ki hai toh usme thoda sa toh time dena padega.
Customer: Unka bhi yahi kehna tha.
Customer: Kyunki reason kya hai ki unka ye kehna hai ki bhai agar jo lead nahi aati ya sir ki leads wagera nahi badhti toh aage bhai woh product kaam nahi kar raha tha unke liye.
Customer: But agar jo lead badhi hai toh kyunki usi ke hisab se hum log observe karte hai ki kahin na kahin usi se business convert hoga sir.
Customer: Ab ab is mahine bhi jo total jo hai na IndiaMART ke level pe jaise agar jo main baat karu marble temple ki jaise abhi hamare level pe jo total lead generate hui hai woh 111 lead generate hui hai.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Jisme se 30 aur 40 aur 46, 30, 40, 56 buylead aap aap use kar chuke hai. Yani ki IndiaMART ke level pe total marble temple ke total leads mein se yani ki 111 mein se 56 buyleads aap use kar chuke hai. Toh woh woh bhi ye keh rahe hai ki keh rahe hai maximum jo IndiaMART ke level pe jitna traffic hai unke keh rahe hai usme maximum toh sir ke paas hi ja raha hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Par even woh star mein ja raha hai.
Customer: Main keh raha hu logo ne bhi leader le rakha hai leader mein unke paas itni leader nahi aa rahi hai sir.
Executive: Ji sir ji.
Customer: Ab woh waha pe kahin na kahin thoda sa yahi karna padega sir ki bhai usme kaise customer convert ho kyunki woh ek cheez hai ki usme toh main aap logo se kaise help karein. [unintelligible] ko kya hai apne se jhooth bol ke vyavhar nahi hota hai.
Customer: Ab log kya hai jhooth bol ke wohi marble aapko jo marble 4 lakh ka aa raha hai woh 1.5 lakh mein de rahe hai ya pata nahi kaise kar rahe hai woh apne se nahi hota hai.
Customer: Toh apan ko bhale hi kam business ho woh chalega lekin jhooth wala business nahi chalta hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir woh toh usme toh koi fayda hai hi nahi hai sir woh toh dekhiye woh jhooth wala toh business kya hai aaj chal jayega woh kal kal parso phir aage kya hoga phir woh woh cheezein toh phir woh.
Customer: Aage woh wohi baat hai, ji ji sir wohi dikkat ho rahi hai mere mein.
Customer: Main wohi hai.
Customer: Abhi main jaise apne Kolkata kaam kar raha hu main.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Toh agle bande ko ye bola ki bhai aap hai na aapko TrustSeal nahi hai na toh aap waha pe Kolkata mein aa jana aur jo maal aa raha hai na usme se kaha ki aap laboratory jaanch karwa lena.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Agar Makrana na hua toh aapke paise usi time return karke jaunga main.
Customer: Woh hai.
Executive: Sir is [inaudible] main wohi toh keh raha hu ki jitna transparency ke saath aap deal kar rahe hai na market mein main bata raha hu ki nahi karte sir log.
Customer: Log toh ye tak nahi bata marble [unintelligible].
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Nahi woh toh right hai lekin kehne ka matlab woh hai ki ab customer apne se set nahi ho pa raha hai jo main wohi baat hai.
Customer: Ab customer abhi tak toh mere paas ek hi banda woh set hua hai 3 mahine ke andar.
Executive: Haan woh aapne bataya bhi tha sir usme.
Customer: Ji aur uske baad mein bhale hi itni lead aayi hogi main ye nahi keh raha hu unke 3 mahine consume nahi ki.
Customer: Maine ki hai consume maine baat bhi ki hai logo se ab koi bande call nahi utha rahe toh woh jabardasti toh baat kar hi nahi sakte apan.
Executive: [inaudible]
Customer: Jaise bhai unka jaise mobile woh nahi ja raha hai ya incoming code nahi bata raha tha toh maine WhatsApp pe bhi contact kiya hai.
Customer: Jaise WhatsApp calling, WhatsApp message woh hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Woh wali baat hai. Toh us hisab se main soch raha hu ki phir itna invest karne ke baad mein bhi koi cheez fit nahi aa rahi hai toh phir invest koi matlab nahi de raha hai. Ab phir woh aage jaake woh dikkat aayegi main ye kahunga yaar band kar do toh woh hai main dekh raha hu regularly rahe apan toh chalta rahe woh wali baat hai.
Customer: Woh ho rahi hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi woh toh dekhiye hum logo ko bhi pata hai dekhiye hum logo ne us time aapko package diya tha madam ne suggest kiya toh unhone bhi kyunki bhai jitni lead hamari aapki product line mein approved ho rahi thi woh wala jo package hai usme itni limit nahi thi ki bhai aap utni lead ko utha sako sir. Toh isliye phir kahin na kahin hum logo ne bola tha ki bhai ki haan is package ko aage hum log upgrade kar dete hai ya isko extend kar dete hai. Toh woh saari saari cheezein thi. But main ye hai ki bhai at the end aapko fayda hona chahiye sir hum logo ka toh main cheez ye hai ki bhai at the end aapke liye fayda hoga toh kahin na kahin tabhi woh cheezein useful honge sir.
Customer: Bilkul right hai. But but main but ye hai ki bhai usko ab aap aap aap apni expectation bataiye abhi aap kya chah rahe hai isme finally ki bhai main ye chah raha hu.
Customer: Aap finally us pe TrustSeal wale pe kar dijiye sir usme kya hai apan dekh lenge agar koi cheez aage kya hoti hai kya nahi hai toh wapis woh aur aage badh lenge aage aur aap ye kar rahe hai ki bhai isko maximizer mein convert karana chah rahe hai abhi aap ya kya aap kaise iska phir woh.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: MDC toh basic aapka chal hi raha hai.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Toh woh basic basic sab hata do aap TrustSeal ek wala aa raha hai na maximizer.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Woh toh usme sabhi aa jayenge woh hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Haan toh woh toh usme kya hai apne koi nahi business aaye na aaye chalta rahega jaise Malik ki marzi hai woh apna naseeb hai.
Customer: [inaudible] to kya kare woh hai.
Customer: [inaudible]
Customer: Woh hai. Kyunki sir dekhiye sir isme kya hai invest thoda zyada ho raha hai ab isme sochna padta hai ki yaar apna 15-20 hazaar bhi per mahina ja raha hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Toh per mahina 15-20 hazaar aur do bande ye le ja rahe hai 30 hazaar ke per mahine ke.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Toh ab apna 50 hazaar minimum ja raha hai pay kar rahe hai apan minimum. Ab 50 hazaar ka jaise profit na ho na per mahine ka toh company loss mein ja rahi hai.
Customer: Main wohi.
Executive: Ye toh usme se 1 lakh toh recover bhi hua hai sir.
Customer: Nahi 1 lakh recover hua toh woh marble bhi toh lage na sir ab kehne ka matlab ye hai ki apan 20% ki jagah 30% maan lo mazdoori isse zyada toh kabhi bhi confirm nahi hota hai 30% bhi woh bhi high level bata raha hu main aapko.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Woh hai. 30% halaki main toh 10% pe hi chalta hu 10 se 15% kyunki main toh kya hai baniyo ke saath jiya hua hu.
Customer: Toh mera ek hi system hai ki apan mahine ka 2 lakh square feet marble bech diya na toh ek 50 paise se 1 lakh mahine kama liye woh hai.
Customer: Woh hamara niyam hai.
Customer: Humko toh ye hai ki bhai apan waise hi market mein fekte hai na paise toh 5% ka return mil jaye na toh bahut kaafi hai per mahine ka.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Ye nahi bol raha hu saal ka.
Customer: Bas woh wali baat hai.
Customer: Ab jaise invest aapko pata hai 2 lakh 6 hazaar aur ye 2 lakh 6 hazaar chhodo aap jaise kam se kam 15 hazaar toh minimum ho hi gaya hai.
Customer: Woh hai. Ab 2 lakh 6 hazaar ka toh woh GST wagera aa gayi 30-30 hazaar ki.
Executive: Ji ji sir.
Customer: Aur 30 hazaar inke ja rahe hai ab phir chai pani woh ab chalo woh toh nahi jodte main toh mera khud ka hi nahi jod raha hu.
Customer: Kyunki main toh sir baniye ke saath jiya hua hu toh woh sabhi cheezein hai na general knowledge mein hai ki bhai baniye kaise kaam karte hai kya karte hai kya nahi karte.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi sahi sahi baat hai.
Customer: Ab baniye kya hai sir woh leke chalte hai 20 hazaar ka ya 40 hazaar ghar ka chalna chahiye.
Customer: Toh koi mehman aa gaya toh usme zyada ek mahina kharch ho gaya na toh agle mahine mein cover karenge woh wapis usko manage karenge toh jabhi chalega sir.
Customer: Woh woh wali baat hai sir ab manage nahi karenge toh zahir si baat hai company bas wohi hai nuksan mein jayegi phir aane wale samay mein abhi toh chhota nuksan dikhega phir woh bada dikhega.
Customer: Woh hai. Abhi toh chalo apan maan lete hai bhai 15-20 hazaar 50 hazaar ja raha hai ab jaise saal do saal saal bhar chalenge toh woh zyada ho jayega bada. Main keh raha hu ki isme maximizer main star ka maine aapka dikhaya usme 11-12 hazaar ke aas paas ka aapko matlab dikha ja raha hai.
Customer: Haan toh wohi main bol raha hu aapko ji.
Customer: Toh kehne ka matlab ye hai ki jaise 2 lakh 6 hazaar toh usme se apan minus karte hai na 21 hazaar 500 apna aa gaya.
Customer: 1 lakh 75 hazaar hai ye 14 hazaar 800 ja raha hai isme 14 hazaar 583 ja raha hai per mahine ka.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Woh hai.
Executive: Koi dikkat nahi sir main ab kya aapka decision hai main ek baar unko main bolta hu woh ek baar connect karke jo bhi kyunki asal mein kya hai ki hum log toh aapse bhai service wagera sara kuch hum log discussion kar lete hai but koi bhi package ko change karna hai koi jo bhi dependent decision woh unhi ke end pe hota hai sir woh decision.
Customer: Nahi nahi koi nahi toh main matlab ye hai ki kya hai aaj 11 hai na apna star aaj ko chalu hua tha toh phir woh tarikh wala phir woh dikkat ho jayegi ki ye woh.
Executive: 11, 11 August ko hua tha aapka ye 11 August ko theek hai ji main aaj ke aaj isme bol ke karwata hu aapko.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Bolti hai theek hai ek baar main unko free hone do main karwata hu.
Customer: Ji ji. Theek hai aur aao kisi din Noida wagera aao ek baar milo toh.
Customer: Milenge milenge bilkul aayenge bilkul abhi main jaake aaya tha halaki aaunga main Delhi bhi aaunga thoda sa woh hai aur isme bhi mauka mile toh phone kar dena.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul theek hai theek hai sir okay dhanyavad okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer concerned about investment not being fruitful.

- Wants TrustSeal converted to maximizer.

- Dissatisfied with the number of leads.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to discuss with senior management.

- Executive will call back after discussing the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after discussing the issue.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, trustseal, maximizer, investment, subscription
